feed.title: zhuzhustory
feed.subtitle: A sad story which happened in Ningbo,China.

entry.title: The within sight but beyond reach taromaru and sad zhuzhu.
entry.content: The taromaru who is within sight but beyond reach and under his mother's phone control. And the zhuzhu who was crying with phone.
entry.summary: The taromaru who is within sight but beyond reach and under his mother's phone control. And the zhuzhu who was crying with phone.

entry.title: Nightmare goes again and struggle over and over again.
entry.content: The nightmare goes again and zhuzhu was diagnosed with severe depression. And the struggle of zhuzhu to save himself.
entry.summary: The nightmare goes again and zhuzhu was diagnosed with severe depression. And the struggle of zhuzhu to save himself.

entry.title: The blame from zhuzhu's parents.
entry.content: The blame from zhuzhu's parents. The dirty words had been in his mind. And he wanted to suicide but failed.
entry.summary: The blame from zhuzhu's parents. The dirty words had been in his mind. And he wanted to suicide but failed.

entry.title: The happiness in Mid-Autumn
entry.content: The happiest day zhuzhu ( may and taromaru ) ever have been has. The message which zhuzhu may will regret to send for a lifetime.
entry.summary: The happiest day zhuzhu ( may and taromaru ) ever have been has. The message which zhuzhu may will regret to send for a lifetime.

entry.title: The difficulties of zhuzhu from NBFLS and his parents.
entry.content: The intolerable stress in NBFLS. The insult from his parents. The hopeless in his life.
entry.summary: The intolerable stress in NBFLS. The insult from his parents. The hopeless in his life.

entry.title: It's the time to Say Goodbye
entry.content: It finally comes to the time to say goodbye. And zhuzhu regretted to sign up for NBFLS Qiangji class.
entry.summary: It finally comes to the time to say goodbye. And zhuzhu regretted to sign up for NBFLS Qiangji class.

entry.title: The start of the nightmare
entry.content: The start of the nightmare. The care from taromaru. The incomprehensible and abusive from parents.
entry.summary: The start of the nightmare. The care from taromaru. The incomprehensible and abusive from parents.

entry.title: Our friendship grows
entry.content: The second part of zhuzhustory. And it is also not sad anymore.
entry.summary: The second part of zhuzhustory. And it is also not sad anymore.

entry.title: Regret we didn't meet sooner
entry.content: The start of the story but it is not sad anymore. And it is the first part of zhuzhustory.
